title: ITI Limited secures Rs 300 cr order for solar street light systems in Bihar
description: ITI Limited has secured a Rs 300 crore order from the Bihar Renewable Energy Development Authority to supply and install 1,00,000 solar street light systems. This project, part of the Mukhyamantri Gramin Solar Street Light Yojana, aims to enhance rural infrastructure with sustainable energy solutions across multiple districts in Bihar.
